### Description

Retrieve a paginated list of orders

Orders can be filtered by status

response.name: Get Orders (200)

request.description:
### Description

Create a new order with purchased items

##### **The total amount is calculated automatically based on items quantity and price**

response.name: Validation Errors Quantity/Price Field is Required (422)

urlencoded.description: product_name field is required if needs to update items
quantity field is required  if needs to update items
price field is required  if needs to update items

request.description:
### Description

Update an existing order details such as items or status.  
  
If order items are updated, the total amount is recalculated automatically.

### Business Rules

Orders with payments cannot have their items modified.

price field is required  if needs to update items

request.description:
### Description

Delete an order only if it has no associated payments

### Business Rules

Orders with payments cannot be deleted

response.name: Order cannot be deleted because it has associated payments (400)

request.description:
### Description

Retrieve details of a specific order including its items.

### Description

Retrieve a paginated list of all payments  
  
Payments can optionally be filtered by order ID

response.name: get all payments with specific order id (200)
Get All Payments (200)

request.description:
### Description

Process payment for a confirmed order using the selected payment gateway  
  
The payment logic is handled using a strategy pattern based on the payment method

### Business Rules

Payments can only be processed for orders with **confirmed** status

The payment amount is automatically retrieved from the order total amount

Payment method must be supported

response.name: payment processing failed order incompleted (400)
